 * command-bank
  * Bank account management.
  * !bank balance
  * !bank deposit `[`amount`]`
  * !bank withdraw `[`amount`]`
  * !bank transfer name `[`amount`]`
  * `[`amount`]` = all if nothing specified

 * experience-logger
  * Powergamers script.
  * table: player_experience (player_id, experience, date)

 * ip-logger
  * Saving player login/logout actions.
  * table: ip_logger (player_id, ip, where (1 - server, 2 - website), type (1 - login, 2 - logout), date)
